room_title: Escape room "The Reporter" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: Well designed and fun rooms. As avid escape room enthusiasts, we played The Reporter at expert level this week. We were warned ahead of time of its difficulty... and it did not disappoint (they beat us, for our 2nd loss ever). I highly recommend this company for a SW Florida escape room experience.
